environment_variables.CCL_WORKER_COUNT: 0 or 2 depending on the number of nodes and instances
environment_variables.MASTER_ADDR: The IP address of the first node in the job
environment_variables.MASTER_PORT: 25679 (default), can be overridden by the user
environment_variables.WORLD_SIZE: The total number of processes in the job
environment_variables.MPI_CMD: The command to launch the MPI processes
environment_variables.BIND_TO: socket (default), can be overridden by the user
environment_variables.MPI_ARGS: Optional arguments for the MPI launcher

software_dependencies.python: Required to run the Python script
